import React, { useState } from 'react' import styles from './table-price.module.css' import TableAdress from './table-adress' function TablePrice({ href, children, deger, ...props }) { const [nums, setNums] = useState('') const [price, setPrice] = useState({ deger }) const [sum, setSum] = useState('') const calculate = (e) => { setSum(e * price) } return (
Yemek Fiyat Adet Tutar
Bursa İskender acılı ₺{price} calculate(e.target.value)} /> ₺{sum}
) } export default TablePrice
